forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning changing to rain late. High near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. E winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow after midnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with a mix of rain and snow after midnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will change to freezing rain as the day wears on. High near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with some snow showers early. Steady rain or freezing rain developing in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain early...changing over to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Some light rain and freezing rain in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become a mixture of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain in the evening will change to a wintry mix. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to a mix of steady rain and freezing rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
